类 Boat

java.lang.Object
Boat
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public class Boat extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a boat in the Coconut Grove Sailing Club fleet. Tracks boat details including type, specifications, purchase price, and maintenance expenses. Implements Serializable for database storage.
版本:
1.0
作者:
Gen Li
另请参阅:

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Boat

      public Boat(Boat.BoatType type, String name, int year, String makeModel, int length, double purchasePrice, double expenses)
      Constructs a new Boat with all specifications.
      参数:
      type - the type of boat (SAILING or POWER)
      name - the name of the boat
      year - the year of manufacture
      makeModel - the make and model
      length - the length in feet
      purchasePrice - the purchase price in dollars
      expenses - the current maintenance expenses in dollars

    • Boat

      public Boat(String csvLine)
      Constructs a new Boat from a CSV formatted string. Format: TYPE,Name,Year,Make,Length,Price[,Expenses] Expenses defaults to 0.0 if not provided.
      参数:
      csvLine - the CSV formatted string containing boat data

  • 方法详细资料

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the boat.
      返回:
      the boat's name

    • getPurchasePrice

      public double getPurchasePrice()
      Gets the purchase price of the boat.
      返回:
      the purchase price in dollars

    • getExpenses

      public double getExpenses()
      Gets the total maintenance expenses for the boat.
      返回:
      the total expenses in dollars

    • canSpend

      public boolean canSpend(double amount)
      Checks if a proposed expense amount is within the Commodore's policy. The policy states that total expenses cannot exceed the purchase price.
      参数:
      amount - the proposed expense amount in dollars
      返回:
      true if the expense is permitted, false otherwise

    • addExpense

      public void addExpense(double amount)
      Adds an expense amount to the boat's maintenance expenses. This method should only be called after verifying with canSpend().
      参数:
      amount - the expense amount to add in dollars

    • getRemainingBudget

      public double getRemainingBudget()
      Calculates the remaining budget available for expenses.
      返回:
      the remaining amount that can be spent

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a formatted string representation of the boat. Format matches the fleet report display requirements.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Object
      返回:
      formatted string with boat details and financial information
